website_summaries.verdict: The design of this cap – which comes in a package of 2 – keeps it from slipping and helps to reduce drag.
pros: Comes in a 2-pack, with several color combo options
Flexible silicone construction, with a textured interior to improve grip
Designed to reduce drag when you swim
cons: Some buyers say this cap rips too easily

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old says it’s comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on my 7 year old daughter’s opinion since she’s the one using the using them. My daughter is an average sized (I think) 7 year old girl. She’s 48 inches tall & 46 pounds. I bought these in January but she’s just now using them for swim lessons. After swim class we both immediately noticed that her hair was a lot drier than previous swim caps she’s used. She said it was too tight & she likes that she has 2 color options. I also love the zipper pouch it comes with. The pouch can hold both swim caps & her goggles (with a case ask) at the same time. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit my 5 & 9 yr ok but one ripped while taking off. Update- the company saw my review and wanted to make it right! They sent me 3 new caps without me asking free of charge! This is commendable! My girls should be all set now. I will order again from them because they stand by their product and remedy any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Karema

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cap for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 4yo well. They're a bit snug to get on, but after some practice it gets easier I also shake a bit of baby powder into the cap to make it go on smoother. One it's on properly, most of my daughter's hair stays dry The edges to get a bit wet, but I don't mind as we wash her hair after each swim class. When she swam with no cap several times each week, her hair became excessively dry and tangled, and it seemed no amount of conditioner could quench its thirst. This cap has resolved that issue!
customer_reviews.author: Shroffie

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite swim cap
customer_reviews.text: We've been looking around locally for a few weeks to replace my daughter's lost swim cap but have not had much luck finding anything that fit (she has long hair) or she liked how it looked. We tried a couple different ones on Amazon, even though they claimed to fit her head they wouldn't stay on. This Friendly Swede cap is her favorite one she's ever had. She likes the bumps on the inside of the cap and how it stays in place. They go on easy and come off without the screaming that it's ripping her hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L. Huber

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves these swim caps!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these so much she uses them even when she's not in the water. The colors are bright and I love that I can spot her in the pool.They are really tough to put on shorter hair, tucking the hair in is not easy if you're not experienced (like me). It took me a few tries to learn to help her with them, but she loves them and they do the job. Easy to wash/clean, delivery was punctual and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Saved my girls’ hair!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters’ hair was becoming strawlike after daily swimming lessons this summer. I had to try something different and noticed a few other kids using swim caps. After reading the reviews on these we decided to go for it. The girls’ hair doesn’t stay 100% dry but it has made a huge difference and after using them daily for 2 weeks their hair is back to normal. Some days it stays dryer than others depending on how well we put them on. Follow the instructions in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Magee

customer_reviews.title: Great swim caps and terrific customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with both the swim caps and the customer service. The swim caps are comfortable and a good size for my 11-year-old with medium-length hair. I also like the beautiful, vibrant colors. They are made of sturdy material and not flimsy. The two-pack price is a good deal for the quality you get. We did have an issue with one of the caps, which mysteriously arrived with a small hole at the top. However, their customer service was exceptional: quick to respond and very willing to help remedy the problem by sending us a replacement. I wish all of Amazon's sellers were this conscientious! We will definitely be buying from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Mutti

customer_reviews.title: Fits well ( even for big headed children)
customer_reviews.text: These swimcaps seem durable! They are not terribly thin and they have held up to play time outside of the pool from my 3yr old ans 5 yr old daughters, as well as swim lessons. That said, they havent been in use for much more than a month... Thus far, the fit is good. It keeps my daughters ' full, thick, long hair--- mostly dry. May be user error because one daughter had 98% dry hair while the other had the very back part get wet... Good buy. Great buy! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: MissLou2425

customer_reviews.title: Great swim caps for kids
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 6 year old starting swim team! They stay in place for practice and keep her hair mostly dry and out of her face. We've used them for a few weeks without any breakage but these things aren't expected to last forever :) She loves the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great company
customer_reviews.text: Short hair, smaller head, or teens, go for it. Larger head, hair past shoulders/or thick, go for the long hair version. They work great, feel smooth, dont make you bald from hair loss and most importantly protect your hair from chemicals
customer_reviews.author: sonoransquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t keep my girls hair dry
customer_reviews.text: Tried these on both my girls 6.5 and 3 year old and their hair was soaked afterwards. I returned them and bought the ones for longer hair hoping that makes a difference cause I assume short hair means bald because my 3 year old has short hair and it was still wet after swimming. I gave it some stars for color and it didn’t rip at any point.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Good value and fit
customer_reviews.text: I've just tried the cap this week. It was easy to put on, using two hands to stretch it and place it over the head going front to back. If you have a kid with longer hair or pony tail, start at the back and stretch it forward. The fit was good as was the coverage. I can't speak to durability yet, but the material seems well-made, and based on other reviews, it seems to last.
customer_reviews.author: DeMinimus

customer_reviews.title: Works the first few times
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and worked great the first 5-7x, after that forget it. I’m pretty sure it got stretched out after multiple uses bc it gets my kids’ hair wet every single time now. They only swim on the weekends for 1H (each day) at the most. Whether the cap goes over their ears or behind their ears, their hair gets wet. The inside is textured with little “bumps”. I think it’s so it doesn’t snag and pull hair. It’s a good idea but doesn’t help with keeping water out. Time to try another swim cap.
customer_reviews.author: MamaAmy

customer_reviews.title: Replaced ripped cap - great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This company stands by their warranty. They quickly sent new caps. So far, so good. Can’t wait to have my kids try them! (Old review) So bummed. The cap ripped the first time I put it on my daughter. I tried to pull it down to see if it would do the trick but her hair still got soaking wet. You could see it through the cap.
customer_reviews.author: JMAP

customer_reviews.title: great. better than any other swim cap i've had
customer_reviews.text: i used to swim for school. have been through a bunch of swim caps. started swimming again as an adult, have tried a few different swim caps in the past few years. this is far and away the best one. durable, colors are great, doesn't get any funkiness. i really like these. would def order again.
customer_reviews.author: emcoa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality & I love the bright colors! I haven't had any complaints about the fit from my daughter either, so two thumbs up! Will definitely order more for future summers on swim team.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has made swim team a joy!
customer_reviews.text: I dread swim season sometimes because I have two girls with long beautiful blond hair. I hate for them not to wear a swim cap as their hair is really susceptible to becoming dingy with frequent pool visits. These swim caps are very easy to put on and off with no hair pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S. Ginn

customer_reviews.title: Meets the objective specifically- nice colors for chirpy girls
customer_reviews.text: I liked the swim caps. It was for my daugher and her friend. After swimming the hair were completely dry. I didnt give 5 star, as I had difficulty in putting the cap wtihout any hitch on my daughter's head, as she has curly fine hari. Another issue was that slowly it was pulling up after some time. It might be a issue of wearing pattern. I may have to try little better. but overall I am happy with product as it solves the purpose of keeping hair dry while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The product is poor. I bought it and on receiving the product to fit to my three year old it popped it half. Softer in texture than the yellow one. I contacted them and no refund issued, so I’m showing the public. Don’t buy, defective and poor customer service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The caps are very good and durable
customer_reviews.text: The caps are very good and durable. We bought it in 2016 and writing this review for exceptional customer service and prompt responses of The Friendly Swede(Maureen and Kendall and rest of The Friendly Swede Team , please keep up the good work). We will definitely buy again from them in future.
customer_reviews.author: 4myprecious

customer_reviews.title: No more tears
customer_reviews.text: I remember decades ago having my hair torn out by my swim cap, ultimately deciding to forego a streamlined head and those few tenths of a second that could be shaved off my 50m freestyle, in preference for keeping all my hair. That is no longer an issue. My daughter finds this swim cap comfortable, and it is successful in keeping her warm in the indoor pool during the winter and early spring. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Swedes have done it again!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the time today, very happy :-) the grippers inside are genius! Once I got it on properly and strapped my goggles in place, I didn't have to touch it again; yes! My last two caps were Speedo and those things never stayed in one place. Would slide up, and I would constantly have to slide it back down...so frustrating. Yes water gets in but it's pretty minimal. More gets in because I backstroke and even with that it's not a ridiculous amount. Two in one pack is awesome. I recommend this product and would buy again...woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: SaiLife5K

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase this ever again.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Did not stay on, kept rolling up. I should have returned them. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst cap. Falls apart within a month.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this the first time and liked the stretch although it leaked (was not good for kids). There was a small rip in the seam so we ordered a new one and the same thing happened within a month. We were putting on the cap and the entire seam ripped apart. Definitely would not buy these caps.
customer_reviews.author: casey wertz

customer_reviews.title: Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: Only point of comparison is the really cheap latex caps....but in comparison, these are amazing! Thicker material, seeming less likely to rip, easier to get on and off, and doesn't rip my hair out. Colors are a little weird but...whatever. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Works for my 9-year-old on swim team :)
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year-old has been on swim team since she was five and needed a new silicone cap. Why not two? :) These caps do fit her slightly large, but it works well for cramming her ponytail in at the base of her neck. The caps fit her comfortably and don't slide off while she's at practice, the colors are vibrant, and even the little moose logo is cute. :) So far, they're lasting really well (she's used them for about two months now - with practice 3x weekly). Definitely a good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars cuz they are cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are 6 and 8 and have normal sized heads, but these didn't cover all of their hair and also kept "riding up" when we tried to adjust them. Not comfy or practical. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: MommaB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but its not working for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these swim caps for my daughter, shes only 6, it fits her well on her first try, the cap itself is high quality Textured silicone, its stretchy and durable, n easy to put on. But after the 2nd use, it started slipping off her while swimming...it pops upward every 5mins, we had to fix it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: You

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the yellow and red/orange that came in the ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend at a masters swim program let me use his extra cap since they come in two packs, and to put it simpy, I will not buy another cap from now on. I'm very happy with the yellow and red/orange that came in the pack. I've used just about every retail brand silicone and latex caps available, and none fit and feel as good as these do. I wear medium/large bike helmet and this cap fits great, because of its superior elasticity. Its also not too big with extra space because its so stretchy. It also doesn't squish your head for the same reason. It would fit equally well for someone who needs a smaller cap.
customer_reviews.author: dion leman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am impressed with how fast the seller ships out the item. The product is of good quality and my 6 year old loves the cap. I was worried that it may not fit her but boy I was wrong. You need to try this product to believe it.
customer_reviews.author: alicia galati

customer_reviews.title: Fits both adults and children
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic swim caps. I use it for myself and for my 2 year old toddler and it fits both of us perfectly well (though it's big enough to get over her ears, which is exactly what I wanted to prevent ear infections). It's thick durable rubber with non-slip patterns on it.
customer_reviews.author: NexusOverride

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After 1 months it tore in half so easily. I don't recommend anyone buying this product. I am very disappointed because I liked the material and thought it would last. I would give this product 0.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great caps!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to try to save my daughter's pink and purple hair from the chlorine. Didn't quite help enough, but the caps are still great and do what they are supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Mel

customer_reviews.title: Happy With These!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 7 year old daughter and they are holding up well. I really like the fact that these are a much higher quality (thicker) than all the other swim caps we've tried before. Also the dimpled inside seems to be a more comfortable fit (at least my daughter complains less). Lastly, these are less maintenance after the fact - meaning other caps require you to powder down once dry to remove wrinkles. Haven't had to do this with these caps.
customer_reviews.author: Anirban Mukherjee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Fits a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old daughter and she loves them! Very good quality. They fit her head and over her ears perfectly. There’s enough slack I can see where they can easily stretch over an adult head, but it doesn’t look weird on her smaller head at all. They do make her head sweat a lot. Not sure if that happens with other swim caps too but she doesn’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are Nice
customer_reviews.text: Hi, Not sure if you received my other message: I bought these swim caps for some young girls and at this time, they are not sure if they will use them or not. I was very happy to see them available for young children. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swim Cap
customer_reviews.text: The original swim cap I received broke the same day. The representatives at The Friendly Swede contacted me right away to find out what happened and offered to send me new swim caps right away! I haven’t used them yet, but was very happy with how great the customer service was!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to use for swim team practices. They are very well made, stretch easily to put on her head, and stay put. No tears (of either kind) as they're also easy to take off and do not pull her hair. Overall, this is a great product - we've been through several varieties of swim caps, and these are our favorites so far.
customer_reviews.author: m.shell

customer_reviews.title: Not the best option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year olds average sized head. Her hair still gets wet every swim class. Going to try another option. That being said, it seems to be good quality, hasn't torn and she says it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Basic swim cap
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because it’s exactly as it says. Not five stars because they break easily and are a bit painful to put on, with both wet and dry hair. Wash and dry easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as to be expected
customer_reviews.text: My girls have beads in their hair and this cap is large enough to cover the entire head comfortably. They hair still gets a little wet but it's not soaked. They are 6
customer_reviews.author: chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Great colors.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the colors and they fit my son perfectly, however, I bought them for me so I would be seen swimming in the lake and they just don't stay on my head. I wanted so much to love these as I like the idea of the little bumps giving added grip but my shoulder length, very thick hair, was too much for these caps. If they were just a little larger, they might have worked. Gave them to my son who is much smaller than me and they fit his smaller head perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lori02

customer_reviews.title: 2 n 4 did not like it. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Kids hate it. 4 and 2. Will try again when they r older. They have big heads. Very well made. I tried it on. Feels good.
customer_reviews.author: michele b

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water out
customer_reviews.text: This swim cap definitely keeps the water out. But you have to get your hair wet first to get it on. That's not a problem for me, but not if you just came from the beauty parlor.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Goren

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting :-(
customer_reviews.text: I (a short haired man) use these while swimming regularly. The fit is pretty good, though I wish the cap was a bit bigger. More importantly, after a few weeks of use I put it on and it ripped apart in the process. I'm not using the second one. We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Tal

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors and effective product
customer_reviews.text: Quality caps that have withstood child’s wear. Love the bright and vibrant colors. Easy to put on but still rejects water from getting in your hair. Very useful and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: lgj

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: I used the cap today on my 5 year old. We went to the beach and it was very rough. The cap slipped up over her ears so I thought for sure her hair was getting soaked. I left the cap on anyway. To my surprise, when we got back to the car her hair was bone dry! Yeah!! love this cap! life saver! Hair washing is a 2 hour experience at the least.
customer_reviews.author: TinaLo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's never used a swim cap before and I wasn't able to be at practice to help her but this was flexible enough that she had no problem on her own. The carrying bag is kind of nice to protect it in her swim bag. It was a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The best swim cap I have ever used...hands down! Also my best customer service experience ever!
customer_reviews.author: docemeritus

customer_reviews.title: Swede Silicone Swim Caps
customer_reviews.text: Going to give it a "test swim" tomorrow! Tried it on dry and I love it...will be perfect when I do it per the instructions! Wish I would have had one of these in the sixties instead of those horrible old-fashioned ones they had then.
customer_reviews.author: mudhead

customer_reviews.title: Great hats, maybe a little small for big hair.
customer_reviews.text: The hats are great they came quickly. Have a nice feel to them. The only complaint I have, is I have a lot of hair and it doesn’t fit on all of my hair. I gave it to my teens and they work great for them.
customer_reviews.author: Yatesclan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 yr old niece to start swim lessons. Great fit, durable material, and we really like the small rubber "dots"on the inside to help with slipping. Great cap
customer_reviews.author: Cleve  fan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter wore this once and it ripped . I would spend more and get a better cap.
customer_reviews.author: Patrizia Tierno

customer_reviews.title: No more hats!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these swim caps because I have fine & thinning hair, love to swim, but find it hard to swim with a hat on!! Why not a good old swim cap? I always had to wear one to the community pool as a child. Well, I LOVE these caps!! So comfy and perfect fit. My husband says I look like a nerd, but I am a sun-burned-head-free nerd!!
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia

customer_reviews.title: Very Tight
customer_reviews.text: They were simply too darn tight; I had to return them for another brand!
customer_reviews.author: D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: durable  ,but not fit for my kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is six years old. She doesn't like wearing it because she feels uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Abandaid

customer_reviews.title: easy to wear with long hair and costumer support is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: pros: -very easy to put it on and customer support is awesome I had a problem with one cap, they helped me out very quickly, I wasn't expecting that. definitely I will use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L

customer_reviews.title: which made up both happy.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 4-yr-old well, even with her long hair, and kept the ocean water out of her ears (a must with wear tubes). Wasn't too hard to get on/off, very minimal hair-pulling, which made up both happy.
customer_reviews.author: DJN124

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get as probably all swim caps are but keeps my daughter's hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Addy 7318

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to put on/off and don't pull her hair as ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 3/4 years old and these fit her perfectly (she pulls her long hair up into them too). They are easy to put on/off and don't pull her hair as much as other caps do. We would buy more for next summer :) UPDATE: this is my second summer buying these. They lasted well and fit great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: SB user

customer_reviews.title: This is the best swim cap ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been swimming for 30 years and this is the first time I bought this brand. This is the best swim cap ever. 1) Very easy to put on and take off; does not stick. 2) Extremely comfortable. 3) Does not roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Soontie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. My girls 8 and 5, swim year round and these caps have been amazing. We love them. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: My 2 boys favorite caps!
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2 sons (age 7 & 10) favorite swim caps. We have tried many different styles and materials and these are by far the easiest to put on and the most comfortable. On top of that the Friendly Swede has great customer service. Now that they are back in stock I am stocking up, just bought a bunch more, because yes swim caps break.
customer_reviews.author: Will M

customer_reviews.title: Hair Completely Gets Wet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these caps for my 6 year old daughter and a complete waste of money. My daughter's hair gets soaked every time so I've stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Meron Shewangezaw

customer_reviews.title: Great cap
customer_reviews.text: They are for my daughter on a swim team. So far she says they fit great. We’ll see in time if they’re durable then I may buy more.
customer_reviews.author: C Bru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The quality is great and my daughter says they are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My boys just joined the swim team and wanted swim caps. We love them. They're easy to use and doesnt hurt them but also are tight enough
customer_reviews.author: Olga Rios

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: SO far so good. My kids (6&8) used them for swimming lessons and I use them to swim twice a week. Hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Rafu

customer_reviews.title: works well for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old uses these for swim team practice. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Feb 2017, good material silicone. Sits nice and snug. Easy maintainance and clean. Can also be used to cover up short hair in order to keep it dry while swimming. Maybe not a good idea to cover ears though so the children can hear teachers instructions better when in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: frequent_user

customer_reviews.title: Mine tore first use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, two packs for three girls. They tore as I put them on my girl’s little heads. I have minimal hand strength after having wrist surgeries.
customer_reviews.author: A Min

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Fits younger children just fine but would probably be a bit of a problem for girls with longer hair. My daughter has medium length hair and I have to adjust her cap at times. It does keep the hair pretty dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worls great for 3 year old taking swim lessons
customer_reviews.text: The swim cap works well for my three year old granddaughter. She has a lot of hair and the cap fits comfortably. It keeps her hair dry during swim lessons and isn't too tight on her head.
customer_reviews.author: 4hondas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swim caps
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the purchase. These are thick and easy to wear and take out. Please provide decent color options that is the only reason I choose black.
customer_reviews.author: Atul

customer_reviews.title: Three-year-old approved
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old daughter and her little BFF are taking swim lessons together. These are slightly big for them, but there is plenty of room for their hair. I bought the pink-purple set, which is great for the girls.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Not for little girls with long hair
customer_reviews.text: These wouldn’t even come close to covering my daughters head, she has too much hair. Probably work great for shorter hair
customer_reviews.author: Sewmomma143

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fits any head
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft silicone. Easier to get on without pulling if you wet your hair first. Fits my big head and both daughters (9 and 6). Received follow up emails from the company making sure we were 100% satisfied. I appreciate that level of customer attention.
customer_reviews.author: buyer123

customer_reviews.title: Durable material, one too small, one good for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5.5 year old. The red one is too tight. The yellow one seems to be more stretchy. She has a pretty regular size head and medium length hair. The material feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We sent these back just because we found out my daughter needed a personalized swim cap for swim team. Felt pretty great though. Made well.
customer_reviews.author: Bret R.

customer_reviews.title: swim cap
customer_reviews.text: these swim caps are very pretty and comfortable. My 5 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: It's so thin, so be extra, extra careful on putting it on.
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this a very low rating as it's so very thin, it ripped by just using slightest pressure to put it on. I would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S.

customer_reviews.title: Small for adults, these are for kids
customer_reviews.text: Too small for an adult woman's head, but perfect for a normal 6-12 year old girl. Easy on, easy off, stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two but one broke on the very first attempt to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Reyes-Dixon

customer_reviews.title: These swim caps work great for my 6 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: These swim caps work great for my 6 year old daughter. They fit snug enough to keep her hair out of her face. For the most part it keeps her hair dry as well. I would recommend these for the price. Plus you get 2!
customer_reviews.author: Involved

customer_reviews.title: Tore apart in a month after using couple of times
customer_reviews.text: These started out well, but one of them just teared down while trying to put it on. Looks like a bad choice on our part.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product based on the reviews and was disappointed. My daughter has used it 3 times since we bought it January 2019 and everytime she wears it her hair is soaked. I even had her wear both at once just to be on the safer side and it didn't make a differrence. Her hair was still soaking wet. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for even little girls w long hair. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 6 yr old twin grand daughters with long hair. they were comfy enough they didn't argue putting them on. No more LONG wet hair. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Caps don’t last! Cap ripped after only 5 uses!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with these swim caps. My 7 year old daughter wore these to swim at camp & after camp for swim team on Monday & Wednesday and then today Thursday she wore it in the morning for swim but it ripped later on when she went to put it on for swim team. So she only got 5 uses out of the cap before it ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good material.
customer_reviews.text: Thick material. Love the carrying case which I use for my daughter’s goggles too. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Mina O.

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have bought these
customer_reviews.text: My 5.5 yr daughter used them at her school's swim class, and says they were comfy and easy to use. I believe her!
customer_reviews.author: sanghama

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One cap arrived with a hole in it and the other broke after only 2 uses. They are bright, cute colors.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Received the caps on time. Like the material and the thoughtful Swedish lesson. I have not tried the caps in water. Will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the Cap tearing and the folks at the friendly swede replaced promptly. Very easy to work with. I highly recommend as the cap fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for my 6-yr old
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and protects my 6-yr old daughter's hair. I ordered a similar product from eBay in the past but that one wasn't good. This product from Amazon really keeps her hair tight and doesn't allow even a single drop to go in.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Singhal

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the product on time, however the pink cap ripped on first try. Sent an email to seller who immediately responded and sent us a replacement product all within 24hrs. Although we were disappointed that the cap had ripped, such superior customer service and a seller that stands behind their product warrants a five stars review. The caps (except the one that ripper, of course) are really good, stretch well to fit my 8 year olds head and seem to be working great for her.
customer_reviews.author: FreddieLM

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought two orders (so 4 caps total) at the beginning of the summer and 3/4 have lasted so far. We swim at least once a week and for 4 weeks during the summer it was every day. I would probably buy these again if the rest hold up through the fall.
customer_reviews.author: mak

customer_reviews.title: best caps, serious!
customer_reviews.text: nice packaging, and great quality. we've been a swimming family for one too many decades and this is hands down the best quality cap we've had. Really like the material and the bumpy texture inside.
customer_reviews.author: Belsea

customer_reviews.title: Good swim cap, great quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these for swim and they’ve been great. Keep her hair dry and help keep her goggles from slipping
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Myers

customer_reviews.title: So glad we found these!
customer_reviews.text: These caps are awesome! My 9 year old just started doing a lot of swimming and the chlorine began to have an adverse effect on her hair. The caps protect the hair fantastically! They are easy to put on and don't hurt when you take them off. Comes with very good directions on use and care. Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R Gribble

customer_reviews.title: Work fine. Her hair still gets a bit wet so ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these for swimming class for my 5 year old. Work fine. Her hair still gets a bit wet so probably better for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: NGson

product_meta.title: The Friendly Swede Silicone Swim Caps for Adult OR Kids (2 Pack)
feature_bullets: SWIM FASTER: Less resistance and reduction of drag through, our hydro dynamic, wrinkle-free design makes you swim faster. Suitable for male and female swimmers.

QUALITY: Greater durability than latex swimming caps - will last for thousands of hours in the pool. Made from 100% premium quality, silicone for maximum stretch and strength because of its tear-resistans. Silicone swim caps are also odorless and non-toxic, thus they are ideal for people with latex allergies and can create a healthy swimming environment.

PRIME FUNCTION: These swim caps are primarily made to keep hair away and reduce water resistance to let you focus on what you really want – Swim! They protect your hair and ear from bacteria, chloride and other substances. Note though that these swim caps aren't fully waterproof, your hair might get wet depending on length and thickness of the hair and the head size.
CLOSER FIT: Textured interior allows for a closer, grippier fit, without causing snagging when putting-on and removing cap.
LIFETIME WARRANTY: The Friendly Swede offers a satisfaction guarantee that extends beyond Amazon’s return window. Contact us 7 days a week: http://amzn.to/1AmGlj8
